name: WitchCraft VR
description:
WitchCraft VR is an action adventure game where you are a mage stuck in an alternate dimension. You must figure out what happened to this world, while learning to use the powers you have gained here.

Features:

  • Single-player gameplay.
  • Immersive virtual reality experience.
  • Gesture system that helps with immersion when summoning spells, like a true wizard!
  • Utilize 3 spells to defeat your enemies: fireball, earth barrier and dark shield.
  • Custom 3D assets and audio, built by actual modelers, animators and audio engineers!
  • Venture in a decadent, magically trapped world!
  • Reach the final area for a boss battle!
  • Immersive narrative for lore and tutorials. No flying instructions on your face!

Controls: the controls are also explained by the narrative during gameplay. Motion controller(s) required.

HTC Vive instructions:

  • Press and hold the trigger to start drawing gestures for spells. Release to summon a spell.
    • Fireball: press and hold the trigger to activate a fireball, make a throwing motion and release to lob it like throwing a stone.
    • Earth Barrier: move the controller sideways to aim the barrier, press the trigger to activate the barrier.
    • Dark Shield: press and hold the trigger to activate the shield. Wait for an enemy projectile to hit the shield, then aim and release the trigger to throw it back.
  • Press and hold the touch pad to start drawing gestures for teleportation. Release to teleport.
  • Press and hold the grip buttons to pull memory gems (a line for aiming will show if done correctly).
  • Press and hold the grip buttons to cancel an active spell.
  • Controls can be done with both hands.
  • Escape key to close the game.

Tips:

  • Pre-summon spells when preparing for battles!
  • Use the Earth Barrier to cover your back while dealing with other enemies!
  • You can dodge projectiles by dodging in real life!
  • If it is hard to hit, teleport closer or use the Dark Shield for an easier trajectory!
